title: Step 1. Get Expo (iOS & Android)
text: Essential to break free from centralized Apps delivery. Expo allows you to download and keep updated the App, no need a Store anymore.

section.title: What's Next?
section.content: Download the Expo app. Create an account and log in. Get Ojas app

section.title: Why this choice?
section.content: Wolves stand apart from Lions and Tigers, because they do not perform in circus.
